extends java.lang.Object
implements Deck<PlayingCard>
    Title: StdPlayingCards_Shoe.java

    Project: game_of_21

    Description: A Shoe of Standard PlayingCards of specified number of Decks, with and without Jokers

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

      StdPlayingCards_Shoe()
      constructor to build a single-Deck Shoe of Standard Playing Cards with no Jokers if no arg is passed

      constructor to build a single-deck Shoe of Standard Playing Cards with or without jokers
      StdPlayingCards_Shoe(int numOfJokers, int numOfDecks)
      constructor to build a Shoe of Standard Playing Cards of a specific number of decks, with or without jokers
